greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Size of sea of composite numbers surrounding n-th prime.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
formula: a(n) = A031131(n) - 2 for n > 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 19 2013
mathematica: Table[ Prime[n + 2] - Prime[n] - 2, {n, 75}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ Oct 27 2004 *)
program: a046930 n = subtract 2 $ a031131 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 19 2013
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Marc LeBrun_
